articles.title: Congratulations to Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Russian President

					Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent a congratulatory message to Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, on Wednesday.
					
					The message said:
					
					I extend warm congratulations to you on your birthday.
					
					I express belief that the long-standing DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation will continue favorably developing in the spirit of the agreement reached at a recent meeting between us and in the interests of the peoples of our two countries.
					
					Please accept my best wishes for your good health and happiness and success in your responsible work to build powerful Russia.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indian Government
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indian Government

					Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the government of India.
					
					The gift was handed to Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun by Sanjay Singh, secretary for East Asia of the Ministry of the External Affairs of India, on a visit to the DPRK, on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Pro-Reunification Patriotic Fighter
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Pro-Reunification Patriotic Fighter

					Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) - Leader Kim Jong Il on Wednesday sent a birthday spread to Hong Mun Go, pro-reunification patriotic fighter, on his 90th birthday.
					
					Born in Songyo District, Pyongyang, before liberation, Hong devoted himself to building a new country after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country and struggled for the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					He was arrested by the enemy while struggling for reunification. 
					
					He had stood firm against the enemy's appeasement and brutal torture for imposing ideological conversion behind bars for 37 years with profound trust in Kim Il Sung and confidence in the victory of the revolution.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that high state commendations including the title of Hero of the Republic and National Reunification Prize were conferred upon him, who had remained true to his revolutionary principle, and repeatedly showed all sorts of warm loving care for him.
